column4: Any Apache experts around that can help me add a virtual host to my server? I already have seven, so adding one more seems like it would be easy, but the additional one kills all the others with no error messages I can find.
default vhost and the order of your others is generally what gets you
Hmm. I have them all in separate files, except for one file which has two.
if your using separate configs for each vhost, look at the order in which they will get loaded
How do you know what order they get loaded in?
ls -l
Ah. And how does that help diagnose?
is the top one your 'default' vhost?
Could be, sure. It worked in the past as the default? I guess...
your new vhost, where does it sit in the order of things?
kinda around the middle.
pastebin it?
http://pastie.org/946379
nothing blares out in that :P
yeah, indeed.
So, my next question is: how to debug.
start apache with -k
-k, eh? Intriguing.
Does that just run apache in the terminal so output is more obvious?
oh sorry, -X
-k is to start/stop it etc
